text: Geneviève Gabrielle Grad (5 July 1944 – 8 November 2024) was a French actress. She was born in Paris, France. Her career lasted from 1959 until 1989. She was known for her roles as Isabelle in Captain Fracasse (1961) and as Nicole in The Troops of St. Tropez (1964). Grad died on 8 November 2024 from cancer at a hospital in La Chaussée-Saint-Victor, France at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:French television actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Geneviève Grad
